444930.name: Zaccaria Pinball
444930.description:
Zaccaria Pinball celebrates the rich legacy of Zaccaria, the Italian pioneers of pinball. Founded by the Zaccaria brothers (Marino, Franco, and Natale), the company became one of the three largest pinball manufacturers in the world and Europe’s leading pinball maker during its golden years (1974–1987). Over this remarkable era, the Zaccaria brothers crafted over 35 iconic machines, each known for their unique design, vibrant artwork, and innovative gameplay that captivated arcade enthusiasts worldwide. Faithful recreations of over 35 Zaccaria tables, designed to preserve their timeless appeal. Enhanced visuals with modern lighting, shadows, and graphical upgrades.

Play Zaccaria Pinball and experience the thrill of classic pinball completely free!

Jump straight into the Time Machine table at no cost. Love the style? Unlock its Retro version simply by joining the Zaccaria Pinball Community Page!

Want more? With over 175+ constantly expanding pinball tables, you can try more than half of them in unlimited trial mode, each with a score limit.

Ready for the ultimate challenge? Story Mode takes you on a journey through 42 uniquely designed pinball tables, each presenting unique challenges. Climb the leaderboard and unlock at least 45 achievements as you master the Story Mode.

And for the complete retro experience, dive into 6 arcade video games that will transport you back in time!

VR Support – Immerse yourself in pinball like never before with full VR support. (Zaccaria Pinball - VR DLC required.)

Free to Play Content – Enjoy the Time Machine table completely free! Try all other tables in trial mode with score limits.

Authentic Pinball Experience – Play highly detailed Zaccaria pinball tables with original rules, sounds, and voiceovers.

Local Multiplayer – Hotseat up to 4 players in Classic game mode or challenge yourself by defeating bots.

Multiplayer Mode – Challenge your friends online, just like in the golden age of arcade halls.

Stunning Visuals – Immerse yourself in breathtaking lighting, dynamic shadows, realistic reflections, and mesmerizing glow effects.

Multiple Physics Modes – Choose from Arcade, Simulation, or up to 4 fully customizable physics presets that you can create yourself. (Zaccaria Pinball – Bronze Pack DLC required for certain options.) 

Customizable Physics – Fine-tuned physics engine with accurate ball movement, flipper action, and table behavior. (Zaccaria Pinball – Bronze Pack DLC required)
Multiple Game Modes – Choose from 8 unique game modes with different challenges to test your skills.

Tournament Mode – Daily, weekly, and monthly official tournaments, plus 9 daily custom tournaments with customizable settings, replay, and history.

Profile & XP System – Level up through 100+ profile levels to unlock rewards and customization items.

Quest System – Complete more than 200+ quests per month, with daily, weekly, and monthly challenges and track the TOP players with the quest leaderboard. (Many quests are DLC specific.)

Cabinet Mode Support – Play Zaccaria Pinball in full Cabinet Mode for the ultimate virtual pinball experience. The playfield is displayed across the entire screen, and you can configure Backglass and DMD monitors to match your custom setup.

Camera Editor – Customize your view with 4 custom camera angles or pick from 3+1 standard presets.

Global Leaderboards – Compete with players worldwide! Every game, game mode and physics mode has its own dedicated leaderboard, so you can prove your skills in any category.

In-Game Market – Discover new customization items every two weeks! The Market adds 7 new items regularly, giving players fresh ways to personalize their pinball experience. The Market uses a coin-based reward system. Coins are earned by participating in tournaments, and there are no microtransactions of any kind.

Licensed Partner Tables – Table categories from POSTAL and Primal Carnage, adding 16 unique tables.

Zaccaria Pinball is more than just a pinball game. It’s a constantly evolving experience with a passionate community (that we truly love and appreciate), daily challenges, and deep progression systems.

Discover a pinball experience for every era and style!

Zaccaria Tables – Authentic recreations of classic Zaccaria pinball tables, featuring original rules, sounds, and voiceovers straight from the golden age of pinball. These tables can be purchased separately as DLC.

EM+ Tables – Explore a unique collection of tables that imagine the missing link between Electro-Mechanical and Solid State pinball machines. These tables showcase how transitional designs might have looked and played if such hybrid machines had existed, combining classic Electro-Mechanical charm with early Solid State innovations. These tables can be purchased separately as DLC.

Retro Tables – A nostalgic journey back to the 1950s, featuring simplified designs and a charming vintage aesthetic. Retro tables can be unlocked by purchasing Solid-State or Electro-Mechanical pinball tables with the same name or purchasing the Zaccaria Pinball - 40 Retro Tables DLC.

Remake Tables – Classic Zaccaria tables, reimagined with a 90s twist! Enjoy bold visuals, enhanced gameplay, and a fresh take on timeless designs. These tables can be purchased separately as DLC.

Deluxe Tables – Next-level pinball innovation! These modern creations introduce dynamic gameplay mechanics, cutting-edge visuals, and thrilling challenges. These tables can be purchased separately as DLC.

Award Tables – Minimalist pinball tables that you can unlock by completing achievements or by purchasing the Zaccaria Pinball - Achievement Table Pack DLC.

Zombie Invasion – Not your average pinball! Face waves of zombies on a custom-designed table, using thunder strikes, rockets, and powerful attacks to survive. Are you ready for the undead onslaught? (Zaccaria Pinball - Zombie Invasion Mode DLC required for access.)

Zaccaria Pinball offers one of the most comprehensive customization systems ever seen in a pinball game, allowing players to personalize nearly every aspect of their experience.

Graphics Tweaks – Adjust lighting, reflections, glow, particles, motion blur, environment, and more to match your style.
Physics Tweaks – Fine-tune flipper strength, ball elasticity, bumper force, and overall table physics.
Camera Adjustments – Create your perfect pinball view with 4 customizable camera slots.

Extensive Customization Options – Featuring over 80 customization options across six major categories, including: Room, Atmosphere, Ball & Table, Physics, Camera, Profile .

Many customization items can be earned through profile leveling, purchased table or table-pack DLC, or obtained from the in-game Market. Full access to all customization options requires the Zaccaria Pinball – Bronze Pack DLC, which also includes additional customization items.

Beyond these, the game also features 8 gameplay-specific categories, offering deeper control over graphics, display, and other gameplay-related settings, allowing players to fine-tune nearly every visual and mechanical aspect of their pinball experience.
444930.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 荷兰语, 匈牙利语, 俄语
